record.description: "The young man and woman standing close-up are members of our class. The man is Harry Rosenberg, a Chicago Attorney who lives near the campus. He could not identify the lady. I [Alan D. Whitney] certainly never knew her, and doubt now if she was a member of the class."
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: From an enclosed letter by Alan D. Whitney, dated Feb 21, 1954 to Robert Rosenthal, Curator University Archives. Info on Un. High School from program found in University High School Building files.
